entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
